name: Reel'ly Fishy!
description:
Summary:
Explore the open seas, catch fish, sell them and upgrade your boat to become an efficient fisherman! However, be warned! There are sharks out there, which will eat the fish you're trying to catch!

This project was created in 3 months for one of my modules at the University of Northampton.

Controls:

Cheats: 
Hold Shift + Tap Q: Gives the player a random amount of gems (50-500).

Thank you for playing my game!
